Package pieces

Interface ForwardMover

All Known Implementing Classes:
King, Queen, Rook
public interface ForwardMover
Interface for pieces that can move forward or sideways
Author:
ibrahimkhajanchi, Karl Sequiera

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    default boolean checkLine​(int[] c1, ChessPiece cp1, int[] c2, ChessPiece cp2, Board chessBoard)
    This method checks that the target piece is on the same line as the source piece

  • Method Details

    • checkLine

      default boolean checkLine​(int[] c1, ChessPiece cp1, int[] c2, ChessPiece cp2, Board chessBoard)
      This method checks that the target piece is on the same line as the source piece
      Parameters:
      c1 - coordinates of the source piece
      cp1 - source piece itself
      c2 - coordinates of the target piece
      cp2 - target piece itself
      chessBoard - board object
      Returns:
      true if cp2 is on the same line as cp1, false if it isn't, or if the line is not empty
